titles.en: Chapter 82 – The one performing Itikaaf sleeps with his wife
Chapter 82 – The one performing Itikaaf sleeps with his wife

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ سَهْلِ بْنِ زِيَادٍ عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ ابْنِ رِئَابٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الْمُعْتَكِفِ يُجَامِعُ أَهْلَهُ قَالَ إِذَا فَعَلَ فَعَلَيْهِ مَا عَلَى الْمُظَاهِرِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: A number of our companions, from Sahl Bin Ziyad, from Ibn Mahboub, from Ibn Raib, from Zurara who said, ‘I asked Abu Ja’farasws about the one performing Itikaaf sleeping with his wife. Heasws said: ‘When he does, so upon him would be what is upon the one who does Zihaar’.

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ أَبِي نَجْرَانَ عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ الْمُغِيرَةِ عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ بْنِ مِهْرَانَ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ مُعْتَكِفٍ وَاقَعَ أَهْلَهُ قَالَ هُوَ بِمَنْزِلَةِ مَنْ أَفْطَرَ يَوْماً مِنْ شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Abdul Rahman Bin Abu Najran, from Abdullah Bin Mugheira, from Sama’at Bin Mihran who said, ‘I asked Abu Abdullahasws about the one performing Itikaaf falling upon his wife. Heasws said: ‘He is as the status of the one who breaks a Fast of a day from the Month of Ramazan’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ الْجَهْمِ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سَأَلْتُهُ عَنِ الْمُعْتَكِفِ يَأْتِي أَهْلَهُ فَقَالَ لَا يَأْتِي امْرَأَتَهُ لَيْلًا وَ لَا نَهَاراً وَ هُوَ مُعْتَكِفٌ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazzal, froom Al Hassan Bin Al Jaham, (It has been narrated) from Abu Al-Hassanasws, said, ‘I asked himasws about the one performing Itikaaf going to his wife. So heasws said: ‘He should neither go to his wife at night, nor at daytime, while he is performing Itikaaf’.
